Detailed Description

Framework class is a proxy program to communicate with the "Smart-Its" and the "Event Heap".

The four main functionalities of this class are:

  1. Create a GUI for the "Smart-Its" proxy.
  2. Use Scanner class to scan the "Smart-Its" availble in the network.
  3. Use ConfigureDialog class to configure a particular "Smart-Its".
  4. Use EventLauncher class to post the "Smart-Its" sensor values as events onto the "Event Heap".

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

Framework.Framework (  String  ip,
String  proxyID
) 
 

Framework class constructor.

The constructor take "Event Heap" IP address and the current proxy Id as an input parameters. The constructor initializes the Particle Framework GUI and the "Event Heap".

Parameters:
ip as a String. Specifies the IP address of the "Event Heap".
proxyID as a String. Specifies the proxy ID to be used while posting Events and to be checked while receiving events.

Member Function Documentation

void Framework.btnAdd_actionPerformed (  ActionEvent  e  ) 
 

Allows to add a "Particle" manually to availble Particles list on the GUI.

This method is called when the "Add" button just below the "Particle List"on the GUI is hit. It constructs a dialog box which can be used to manually add a particle to the "Particle List".

Parameters:
e as an ActionEvent object. This parameter is never used.

void Framework.btnConfigure_actionPerformed (  ActionEvent  e  ) 
 

Starts the configuration dialog for configuring "Particle" sensor module.

This method is called when the "Configure Particle" button on the GUI is hit. It constructs an Object of ConfigureDialog class and starts a dialog box using which one can configure "Particle" sensor module.

Parameters:
e as an ActionEvent object. This parameter is never used.

void Framework.btnExit_actionPerformed (  ActionEvent  e  ) 
 

Exits the application.

This method is called when the Exit button on the GUI is clicked. It exits the application.

Parameters:
e as an ActionEvent object. This parameter is never used.

void Framework.btnScan_actionPerformed (  ActionEvent  e  ) 
 

Starts the Scanner for network scanning of Particles.

This method is called when the "Scan Network" button on the GUI is hit. It constructs an Object of Scanner class and starts scanning the network for "Particles" in a separate thread

Parameters:
e as an ActionEvent object. This parameter is never used.

void Framework.btnStart_actionPerformed (  ActionEvent  e  ) 
 

Constructs a object of EventLauncher class which starts to post the "Particle" sensor data.

This method is called when the "Start Framework" button on the GUI is hit. This causes the EventLauncher class to start posting sensor values as events from "Particles" onto the "Event Heap".

Parameters:
e as an ActionEvent object. This parameter is never used.

void Framework.btnStop_actionPerformed (  ActionEvent  e  ) 
 

Stops the posting of "Particle" sensor data onto the "Event Heap".

This method is called when the "Stop Framework" button on the GUI is hit. It causes the EventLaucher object to stop posting the "Particle" sensor data onto the "Event Heap".

Parameters:
e as an ActionEvent object. This parameter is never used.

Initializes the GUI.

This method is called by the Framework constructor to contruct the GUI

void Framework.particleListUpdated (  ListSelectionEvent  e  ) 
 

Called whenever the particle list is updated.

This method is called whenever the list of particles is updated.

Parameters:
e as an ListSelectionEvent object. This parameter is never used.
